languages.text: "Довольно". {n}Хейнрикс вытаскивает оружие, воздух вокруг него начинает холодеть.{/n} "Усыпим эту бешеную тварь сейчас — раз и навсегда".

traits.locale_text: "Довольно". {n}Хейнрикс вытаскивает оружие, воздух вокруг него начинает холодеть.{/n} "Усыпим эту бешеную тварь сейчас — раз и навсегда".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "This ends now." {n}Heinrix draws his weapon, and the air around him grows colder.{/n} "We are putting the rabid beast down for good."

languages.text: « Ça suffit comme ça. » {n}Heinrix tire son arme, et l'air se charge d'une tension glaciale autour de lui.{/n} « Il est temps d'abattre cette bête enragée. »
languages.original_text: "This ends now." {n}Heinrix draws his weapon, and the air around him grows colder.{/n} "We are putting the rabid beast down for good."

traits.locale_text: « Ça suffit comme ça. » {n}Heinrix tire son arme, et l'air se charge d'une tension glaciale autour de lui.{/n} « Il est temps d'abattre cette bête enragée. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「ここまでだ」{n}ハインリックスが武器を抜くと、周辺の空気が冷たくなった。{/n}「凶暴な獣を永遠に眠らせてやろう」
languages.original_text: "This ends now." {n}Heinrix draws his weapon, and the air around him grows colder.{/n} "We are putting the rabid beast down for good."

traits.locale_text: 「ここまでだ」{n}ハインリックスが武器を抜くと、周辺の空気が冷たくなった。{/n}「凶暴な獣を永遠に眠らせてやろう」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “到此为止了。”{n}海因里希抽出武器，周围的空气变得更加冰冷。{/n}“我们要彻底消灭这只发了疯的畜生。”
languages.original_text: "This ends now." {n}Heinrix draws his weapon, and the air around him grows colder.{/n} "We are putting the rabid beast down for good."

traits.locale_text: “到此为止了。”{n}海因里希抽出武器，周围的空气变得更加冰冷。{/n}“我们要彻底消灭这只发了疯的畜生。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Schluss damit." {n}Heinrix zieht seine Waffe, und die Luft um ihn herum wird kälter.{/n} "Wir schläfern die tollwütige Bestie ein für alle Mal ein."
languages.original_text: "This ends now." {n}Heinrix draws his weapon, and the air around him grows colder.{/n} "We are putting the rabid beast down for good."

traits.locale_text: "Schluss damit." {n}Heinrix zieht seine Waffe, und die Luft um ihn herum wird kälter.{/n} "Wir schläfern die tollwütige Bestie ein für alle Mal ein."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Esto se acaba aquí». {n}Heinrix desenfunda su arma, y el aire se enfría a su alrededor.{/n} «Ya es hora de sacrificar a esta bestia rabiosa».
languages.original_text: "This ends now." {n}Heinrix draws his weapon, and the air around him grows colder.{/n} "We are putting the rabid beast down for good."

traits.locale_text: «Esto se acaba aquí». {n}Heinrix desenfunda su arma, y el aire se enfría a su alrededor.{/n} «Ya es hora de sacrificar a esta bestia rabiosa».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Bu iş burada bitecek." {n}Heinrix silahını çekiyor, ardından etrafındaki hava birden soğuyor.{/n} "Bu kuduz hayvanı kesinkes uyutacağız."
languages.original_text: "This ends now." {n}Heinrix draws his weapon, and the air around him grows colder.{/n} "We are putting the rabid beast down for good."

traits.locale_text: "Bu iş burada bitiyor." {n}Heinrix silahını çekiyor ve çevresindeki hava birden soğuyor.{/n} "Kudurmuş hayvanı, bir daha ayağa kalkmamak üzere indireceğiz."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
